name: Potion Commotion (itch) (frozendoze, HT_Kage, Mirando)
description:
Throw explosive potions because you suck at brewing anything else.

-GAMEPAD RECOMMENDED-

Team
Frozendoze: Programming, Level Design, Juice
Kage: Art, Level Design
Mirando: Music
NateTheSoundNinja: Sound
Stoff: Promo Art

Controls
Movement: Left Stick/D-Pad -or- WASD/Arrow Keys
Aim Potion: Right Stick -or- Mouse
Throw Potion: RB -or- Left Mouse Click
Restart Level: Select -or- R
